confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the data in ${name}?
getTab: Print all opened custom tabs in the log
name: Siyuan

hello.makesure: Before using this template, please read the official tutorial to make sure you understand the plug-in. Basic development process.

hintDesc:
1. Applicable scenarios: Documents need to be published publicly to the public network.
2. Publication nature: static document (will not change with changes in documents on Siyuan Notes)
3. Version nature: Beta version (function is unstable, shared links may be cleaned), project Open source address
4. Supported platforms: desktop, desktop browser
5. Supported systems: macos, windows, linux
5. Cache directory location: Siyuan data folder/tmp/plugin/share-note (Note: Clean up before each export)
6. WeChat contact information: uBpHJlVdn5k15G3dhLh1
menu_address_title: Backend address of the sharing system
menu_address_desc: The default is http://124.223.15.220, you are welcome to build it yourself
menu_delete_share_desc: Delete the shared link and the resource file corresponding to the link.
menu_create_share_desc: For addresses that have been shared, if there are changes to the original page, please update it again. Changes include text or theme styles. Do not click this button multiple times.
memu_access_code_desc: If yes, please fill it in. It is suitable for calling in a non-client environment (such as a web page with a non-loopback address or an environment with authorization code enabled). Please get it from the settings
memu_enable_browser_desc: After enabling, you can use the plugin in the browser
memu_hide_version_desc: The version number of Siyuan Notes that hides the exported page title
err_upload: Upload failed, please check from the console or contact the author
err_network: Network error, please check the network
